trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGDRA2IDYLLSHIRE_00289_IDYLLSHIREGUIDE_000_000<tab>Pshkohhh... Uplander has questions? Cheepchix has answers!
TEXT_REGDRA2IDYLLSHIRE_00289_IDYLLSHIREGUIDE_000_010<tab>Scavenge, learn, build! The technology of Sharlayan is ours for taking!
TEXT_REGDRA2IDYLLSHIRE_00289_IDYLLSHIREGUIDE_000_011<tab>Gobbieflock learns much and more every day from junk and tomes. Fill braincases with uplander words and wisdom!
TEXT_REGDRA2IDYLLSHIRE_00289_IDYLLSHIREGUIDE_000_012<tab>But Illuminati wants words and wisdom all for themselves. Cheepchix cannot abide that! Cheepchix likes having embiggened vocabulary!

TEXT_REGDRA2IDYLLSHIRE_00289_IDYLLSHIREGUIDE_000_020<tab>Gobbieflock wanders for many years, in accordance with gobbie tradition. But then, by great fortune, gobbieflock comes to abandoned city of Sharlayan!
TEXT_REGDRA2IDYLLSHIRE_00289_IDYLLSHIREGUIDE_000_021<tab>Much wisdom to be had in study of junk and reading of tomes. The decision is made: gobbieflock must stay!
TEXT_REGDRA2IDYLLSHIRE_00289_IDYLLSHIREGUIDE_000_022<tab>Later come like-minded uplanders to share in spoils. Together we build Idyllshire─community of hardworking, industrious individuals!
